WRITING.TEXT:
College. When I was little, my folks made it seem like a matter of life or death if you didn't get in, didn't get the grades, and didn't graduate.
Lol, at my college, everyone was either always protesting, always partying, and the teachers that DID come talked about time spent with their famous friends who "made the wise choice of not going into teaching"
I legitimately enjoy my alone time and doing everything by myself or with the few close family and friends I have.

Good for you! I've been on dates with bigger people and I've also been the bigger one a few times and it wasn't their size that was noticed. Ultimately, it was all good if they could just keep a decent conversation and didn't give off any bad vibes.
Do people actually notice this still? Do your thing and have fun with the person you're with.
The being anonymous part helps. People aren't afraid of putting their true, deep thoughts down when there are no risks of being revealed.

WRITING.TITLE: Freelance writer that can help with your essays, schoolwork, etc.
WRITING.TEXT:
Shoot me a message and we can talk about whatever you need.
Pricing based on case and everything kept discreet.

That (and this is just coming from the younger people I have talked to) some people think that intelligence only comes from sitting at a school desk all day or reading books based on someone else's experiences.
People have to venture out more!
